description: Police arrest a 44-year-old man after another man is stabbed in Plymouth in the early hours.
title: Man arrested after stabbing in Plymouth car park
title_page: Man arrested after stabbing in Plymouth car park - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been arrested after a stabbing in a car park in Plymouth, police have said.
Devon and Cornwall Police said officers were called to the car park on Regent Street at about 05:20 GMT.
A man in his 40s was hurt but his injuries were not believed to be life-threatening or life-changing, officers said.
Police said a 44-year-old man from Plymouth was arrested on suspicion of causing grievous bodily harm with intent.
